content: tel in minutes | | distanceFromStation | `'string'` | Total distance to the hotel in KMs | | hotelId | `'string'` | Hotel code | | hotelName | `'string'` | Hotel name | | hotelAddress | `'string'` | Hotel address | | hotelEmail | `'string'` | Email of the hotel's reservation or support desk | | hotelPhone | `'string'` | Phone number of the hotel | | status | `'string'` | Status of the activity. S = Scheduled, A = Active, F = Finished, C = Cancelled | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Simulator Flight Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | rosterId | `'string'` | Published roster id of the crew, including this simulator flight| | tripId | `'string'` | Trip id of the crew, including this simulator flight | | dutyId | `'string'` | Duty id of the crew, including this simulator flight | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | code | `'string'` | Simulator flight code | | station | `'string'` | Airport of the simulator flight if possible | | startDate | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the simulator flight in UTC | | endDate | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the simulator flight in UTC | | position | `'string'` | Position of the crew | | trainingCrewAssignmentId | `'string'` | Identifier of the crew assignment associated with the training, if applicable; otherwise, null. | | trainingId | `'string'` | Unique identifier for the training session. | | trainingCode | `'string'` | Code representing the type or category of the training activity. | | instructorName | `'string'` | Full name of the training instructor. | | trainingRole | `'string'` | Role of the crew in the training. | | trainingVenue | `'string'` | Venue where the training takes place. | | status | `'string'` | Status of the activity. The status is "ACTIVE" for simulator flights assigned to the crew and "CANCELLED" for removed simulator flights. | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extr
